machineID.description: Identify the system (S/N or Unique Identifier)

anomalyType.description: Class and Grade of anomaly (Classification referred to the maintenance)

anomalyIndicators.description: Technical information about the anomaly (Information on analysis)

maintenanceDeadline.description: Maintenance required by .. (Last date for optimal action)

maintenanceDateScheduled.description: Maintenance date proposed (To be confirmed by customer)

maintenanceOperator.description: Name and skill (Operator in charge of the activity)

items.description: Component code and description (List of all the materials required)

componentsRequired.description: List of machine components required for the maintenance

durationOfOperation.description: Working time on system (Number of hours to execute the activity)

activityRequiredOfCustomer.description: Customer preparation activities for maintenance (To be confirmed by customer)

costForecast.description: Calculated cost of the activity (To be confirmed at the end of maintenance)
